154b6('bum): ba bstan to// sems dang po bskrad pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed
154b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyir pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rang spong pa nyid dang / phyi steng pa nyid dang
154b8('bum): phyi nang steng pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po steng pa nyid dang / den dang pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pas steng pa nying dang / 'das pa pas steng pa nyi dang / mtha' las 'das pa steng
155a1('bum): pa 'ing dang / theg pa dang thar med pasteng pa 'i dang / der ba med pa steng ba'i dang / rang bzhir steng pa'ing dang / ches thams cad steng pa'i dang / rang gi ra
155a2('bum): sbeng pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po red pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
155a3('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang rab kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lar yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bas
155a4('bum): gdar bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dag dang / rnam par thar pa'i
155a5('bum): sde stong pa 'ang dang / mtshan ma ring ba dang / sped pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
155a6('bum): sdebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / blangs pa chen po dang / snying rje der po dang / sangs rgyas kyi nges pa 'dres pa bco brgyar dag kyang bstan
155a7('bum): bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ nges dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams shes rab kyi
155a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing rdzus de skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// nges na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'am pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur re// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ras sangs rgyas kyi ming du 'a
155b1('bum): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bun
155b2('bum): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ches gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du rar yang rgyan 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug
155b3('bum): pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i rdul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ri rigs pa'i tshul gyis thegs pa
155b4('bum): med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun bachad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i slebs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i slebs pa
155b5('bum): rang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa byas steng pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
155b6('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
155b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
155b8('bum): nang steng pa nyid dang / phyi steng pa nyid dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / der dang pa stong pa 'ang dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
156a1('bum): 'dus ma pas steng pa'ing dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg pa dang thar meng pa steng pa nyid dang / de ba meng pa steng pa'i
156a2('bum): rang bzhir steng pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid dang / dngos po meng pa steng pa nyi dang / de bzhing steng pa zhing dang
156a3('bum): dngos po rang pa'i ngo ba nyid steng pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / bang da
156a4('bum): yang lag bdan dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgya da pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan ba zhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sems pa
156a5('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rna par thar pa'i ske steng pa nyid dang / mngar pa med pa dang
156a6('bum): spen pa dang ring pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
156a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
156a8('bum): be rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang
156b1('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes pa'o/ des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'deng zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
156b2('bum): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mched par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phur sum tshogs par
156b3('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad rakhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du dam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / 
156b4('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ngag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / 
156b5('bum): rgyur 'chang ba meng ba'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gnag ba'i slebs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'bre la pa'i spobs pa dang / ded dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang
156b6('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spongs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'ang sa pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po
156b7('bum): yongs su gzung ba bsdar do// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
156b8('bum): rol tu phyir pa dang / bzeng ba'i pha rol tu phyir ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang steng ba nyid dang / 
157a1('bum): phyi steng panying dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid dang / steng pa nyi steng pa'i dang / chen po steng ba 'ing dang / der dam pa steng pa cing nga 'das pas snang pa cing
157a2('bum): 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid dang / theg pa dang thal med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba meng pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhir steng pa nyid dang / ches thams cad sbeng pa
157a3('bum): dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa meng pa stong pa nyid dang / nge ba nyid steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa 'i bar
157a4('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi ya na lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
157a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtar bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par drug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
157a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa 'o sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / spen pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
157a7('bum): gzungs kyi sna thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se se yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa med po dang / seng rje bar po dang / sangs
157a8('bum): rgyas kyi ches pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstar te/ des na byang
157b1('bum): chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can
157b2('bum): du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'deng zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya
157b3('bum): ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phur sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
157b4('bum): mkhyen pa nying thob par ma gyur gyi bar du num yang rgyun 'chang par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// 
157b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis thegs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chang pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag
157b6('bum): pa'i spongs pa dang / rigs pa'i slebs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhags pa'i spobs
157b7('bum): pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems
157b8('bum): bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
158a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang snang pa nying da byi stong pa
158a2('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / steng pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa ring dang / mtha' las
158a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma mang ba stong pa nyid dang / der nga med nga steng pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thas cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshar 'di stong pa
158a4('bum): zhing dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mang pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngong nyid steng pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi da
158a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pab zhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stebs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag paH
158a6('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
158a7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
158a8('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
158b1('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
158b2('bum): par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa
158b3('bum): rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim
158b4('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
158b5('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad ra khe na ba nyid thob par ma gyu gyi 'dunam yang rgyun 'chad par ri 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag
158b6('bum): pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// yA sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa 'a tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / rgyan 'chad pa
158b7('bum): rang pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i slebs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i slebs pa dang / 'jig rjer thams cad la mngon
158b8('bum): par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// der ba med pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// 
159a1('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
159a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang snang pa
159a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
159a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
159a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa steng ba 'di dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
159a6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye der gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dang me lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
159a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bder pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad me pa ba'i dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang
159a8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyang dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / na pa med pa dang / mngon pa
159b1('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
159b2('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi nges ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kyi mngor par shes pa
159b3('bum): dang rdzu 'phral gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pa rol tu pan pa la spang cing rdzas te skye bar 'gyur zhes pa'o// 
159b4('bum): des ra mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su rnam pa meng 'chis can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ras sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'angang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gas
159b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim grer ba ba dang / bkur stir ba ba dang / phu dung du byang dang / pa rang rabya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge pa'i rtsa bde dag kyang pur
159b6('bum): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhar pa cing thob par la gyur pa bar du rnam yang rgyar 'chang bar po 'gyur
159b7('bum): 'khrug pa rang ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' par po de dag ma dpags pa'o
159b8('bum): tshul gyis thegs pa mang ba'i spobs pa dang / rgyur 'chang pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spabs
160a1('bum): pa dang / der dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyuraro/ 
160a2('bum): rang bzhin steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstar te// sems dang po skyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi bang dub sems dpa'i
160a3('bum): rgya ba 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
160a4('bum): pa rol tu phyir ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi steng pa nyid dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid steng pa nyid dang / chen po steng pa nyid
160a5('bum): dang dor dang pa steng pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyi nga dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tham me pa stong pa
160a6('bum): dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa 'di dang / dngos pa
160a7('bum): med pa steng pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
160a8('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
160b1('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
160b2('bum): ba'i sde steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshes pa'i
160b3('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan
160b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bsta na te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de
160b5('bum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos cad du'ang 'gyur ro// 
160b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mched
160b7('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ches gang zhes pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
160b8('bum): ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
161a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' den po de dag pi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thegs pa meng pa'i spongs pa dang / rgyur 'phang ba meng pa'i spobs pa dang / mamam par gan
161a2('bum): ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / der dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khya zhugs pa
161a3('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// res thams cad steng panyid kyi phyir/ byang dung sems dpa' sems dpa' che po yongs su gzung ba bstan / sems dang po bskyed ba ras
161a4('bum): sems ban pa bsred pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ spen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
161a5('bum): brtser 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gdar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang steng pa nyid dang phyi steng pa nyid dang yim steng
161a6('bum): shing dang / steng pa nyid stong pa zhing dang / cher po steng pa nyid dang / der dam pa steng pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas steng pa nying dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
161a7('bum): theg rang thar re ba steng pa nyid dang / der ba med pa sbeng pa zhing dang / rang bzhir steng pa nyid dang / chos thams cad steng pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang
161a8('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po reng pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
161b1('bum): sbeng ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yar lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bder
161b2('bum): nga bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa
161b3('bum): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i ske steng pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
161b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje re pe dang / sangs rgyas kyi res pa
161b5('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems nga pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phral gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstar te/ 
161b6('bum): nges dbang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// nges ra mngan par shes pa rnams la yongs su rnam pa yang
161b7('bum): ches can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'deng zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim grer bya ba dang / bkur stir bya
161b8('bum): ba dang / bdud du bya ba dang / mched par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las nges gang thos par
162a1('bum): yang rnam pa thams cad pakhyer pa nyid theb par mgyur gyi bar du dpa yang rgyur 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa rang ba dang / bsam par gzhag pa meng pa'i
162a2('bum): tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag po dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / rgyur 'chad pa med pa'i
162a3('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i slebs pa dang / rigs pa'i slebs pa dang / 'brel pa'i sbrebs pa dang / den dang ldan pa'i slebs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par
162a4('bum): 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan te/ 
162a5('bum): sems dang be bskyed pa ras/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162a6('bum): dang bzod pa'o pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pan pa dang / rang stong pa nyid dang / byi steng
162a7('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang steng pa nyid dang / steng pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa steng pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
162a8('bum): las 'das pa steng pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid dang / der ba leng pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin snang pa nyid dang / ches thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshar zhing steng pa
162b1('bum): nying dang / mi darigs pa steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa steng pa nyid dang / de bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang
162b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yar lag brgyad pa dang
162b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
162b4('bum): pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i ske steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma red pa dang / spen pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
162b5('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhir gsheg sa pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po da
162b6('bum): snying rje par po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phral gyis rnam par
162b7('bum): bdag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes pa'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la
162b8('bum): yongs su nur pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'deng zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim grer bya ba dang
163a1('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'ded pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phur su tshogs par 'gyur ro// 
163a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ches gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'dang par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang
163a3('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis thegs pa med pa'i snga
163a4('bum): pa dang / rgyar 'chad pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / mnyan par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i slebs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / der dang ldan pa'i spa
163a5('bum): pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur raM// pi dmigs pa steng ba nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
163a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstaran to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi bang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ smin pa'i pha rol tu
163a7('bum): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtser 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
163a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang steng pa nyid dang / byi steng pa nyid dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid steng pa nying dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / der dang pa steng ma 'ang dang / 'dus pa
163b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba med pa steng pa nyid dang / rang bzhir stong pa nyid
163b2('bum): dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi pa ngar 'ang steng ba shing dang / mi dmigs pa steng pa zhid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nying steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med
163b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nying steng pa nying dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang rab kyi yang
163b4('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan pa zhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs red pa'i snyems
163b5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshar ma med pa dang
163b6('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag
163b7('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byabs pa chen po dang / snying rje re pe dang / sangs rgyas kyi nges pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i che po rnams kyi
163b8('bum): mdzen par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstar te/ nges rabyang dab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la se rdzus te skye
164a1('bum): bar 'gyur zhes pa'o// ngesar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos car du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
164a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dang du bya ba dang / mched par bya bar
164a3('bum): 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ches gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb par ma
164a4('bum): gyur gyi bar nga ram yang rgyun 'chang par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu phagapa par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub
164a5('bum): sems dpa' sems cher po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa thegs pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / rgyur 'ang pa med pa'i slebs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spabs
164a6('bum): pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / der dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
164a7('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems
164a8('bum): bcu pa bskyang ba'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sprir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyir pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa dang
164b1('bum): brtser 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtaran gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang steng pa nyid dang / phyi steng pa nyid dang / byi nang steng pa nyid dang / 
164b2('bum): steng pa nyid steng pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / der dam pa steng pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'das ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
164b3('bum): theg pa dang thal med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / ches thams cad steng pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
164b4('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa steng pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spang ba
164b5('bum): ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stabs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yang lag bad rang 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa dang 'ab
164b6('bum): pa'i bde pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
164b7('bum): sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / sped pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ting nge 'dzer thams cad dang
164b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se se yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bams pa chen pe dang / snying rje chen po dang
165a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyang dag kyang bstar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang
165a2('bum): 'phral gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// nges na mden
165a3('bum): par shes pa rnams la yongs su tham pa meng ba'i chos car du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas zhing du 'deng zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
165a4('bum): la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bye ba dang / pu dang du b+ha ba dang / mched bar bya bar 'ded pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang pur su pa rigs par 'gyur ro/ 
165a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ches gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du ram yang rgyur 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa
165a6('bum): med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
165a7('bum): thogs pa meng ba'i spobs pa dang / rgyur 'ang ba med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i slebs pa dang / de dang
165a8('bum): ldan pa'i spongs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo ba zhid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
165b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan te// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ srir pa'i pha
165b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
165b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang steng pa nyid dang / phyi steng pa nyid dang / phyi rang steng pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid steng pa nyid dang / chen po steng pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
165b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'das ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba med pa steng pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
165b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad steng ba nying dang / rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang / mi darigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
165b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
165b7('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdar dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gang rwa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
165b8('bum): dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
166a1('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / sper ba med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi ske thams cad dang
166a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
166a3('bum): brgyad dag kyang bstar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ nges ra byang chub sems dpa'
166a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// nges ra / par shes pa rnams la yongs su gam pa med pa'i ches ca
166a5('bum): dung 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ras sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la ring greng bya nga
166a6('bum): dkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mched par bya bar 'dad pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
166a7('bum): chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nar yang rgyun 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa
166a8('bum): tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spongs pa dang / rgyur 'chad pa
166b1('bum): meng pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i skabs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spangs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spongs pa ra/ 'jig rten thams cad las
166b2('bum): mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan
166b3('bum): te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
166b4('bum): bzed ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rang stong pa nyid
166b5('bum): byi steng pa nyid dang / phyi nang steng pa nyid dang / steng pa nyid steng pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / der dam pa steng nyid dang / 'dus byas steng pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas sto
166b6('bum): pa'id dang / mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad steng pa nyid dang / ra
166b7('bum): gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
166b8('bum): ba'i dang / yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stengs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdud dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
167a1('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
167a2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshar pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
167a3('bum): balnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
167a4('bum): bzhi dang / byangs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
167a5('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba ga kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
167a6('bum): sbed cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong
167a7('bum): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pu dung du bya ba dang / mched par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa
167a8('bum): bde dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad
167b1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
167b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thegs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spongs pa dang / 'brel
167b3('bum): nga'i spobs pa dang / der dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
167b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag brgya pa las// le'u bcu drug go// / dam po brga lnga pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
167b5('bum): byin 'di skar du sems par gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char pa 'di pab ste/ bstan na de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
167b6('bum): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog mngon par sprul pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang
167b7('bum): gnas brdan rab 'byer la gter bar bya'o// mngon par gter bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o zhes/ de nas steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
167b8('bum): kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lnga dang / 'phrul pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang
168a1('bum): tshangs lhanye ban gyi lnga dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lnga dang / tshangs chen gyi lnga dang / snang ba'i lnga dang / chung snang gi lnga dang / mang med snang ba lnga
168a2('bum): dang kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lnga dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / ra 'i lha dang / tshad meng che ba'i lha dang
168a3('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lnga dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nem snang ba'i lnga dang / reg rir gyi lnga ji snyed cig yeng nga de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems
168a4('bum): par gyur te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis ches kyi char pa 'di bang ste/ bstar na de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sa red bar bya ba'i phyir re
168a5('bum): titeg mngon par sprul pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / 
168a6('bum): gnas brtan ra ba'i 'byer la gter bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gter bar bya'o snyam me// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten
168a7('bum): gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi
168a8('bum): lnga dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med
168b1('bum): snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang
168b2('bum): tshang med re ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag thams
168b3('bum): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man da rab mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
168b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur te// mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// rab tu 'ther bar
168b5('bum): gyur te// me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu steng ga sum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dig ni me tig gis khebs par gyur nas/ steng gi bar
168b6('bum): sdang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur te// de nas gnas
168b7('bum): brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngan chad lnga'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par pa
168b8('bum): mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las 'ang ba pa yid/ cha las skyes pa ma yin/ zang las
169a1('bum): skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis bangon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldan
169a2('bum): bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'ber me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ 
169a3('bum): me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no// ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma sres pa ste/ me tog 'di
169a4('bum): ngag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum du las byung ba ma yin no// zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 
169a5('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshim byung bar zad dam 'on tam gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba yang ma byu nga / 'du shes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang pa byung
169a6('bum): rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshem byung bar ma zad kyi/ ko'u shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
169a7('bum): gzugs ma yin de// ko'u shi ka tsher ba yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de ni 'du shes ma
169a8('bum): yin no// ke'u shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes
169b1('bum): nga ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mig ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste
169b2('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni smra ba yin no// ke'u shi ka lce ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus ma yin de// ko'u
169b3('bum): yid ro ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin de// ko'u shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sgra ni byung ba ste/ 
169b4('bum): gang pa byung ba de sgra ma yin de// ke'u shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de dri ma yin re// ke'u shaM ka ro ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de re re pa yin ro// 
169b5('bum): ke'u shi ka reg ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg ma yin no// ko'u shi ka tshes ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung bde ni ngos pa yin no// ke'u shi ka mig gi rnam par
169b6('bum): shes pa ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes
169b7('bum): pa pa yin no// ke'u shi ka sA'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang
169b8('bum): ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin do// ko'u shi ka
170a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka rag gi 'dus te reg par
170a2('bum): byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi 'das te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de ni rna ba'i 'das te reg pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka
170a3('bum): sna'i 'das te reg pa ni mi byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka lI'i 'dus te reg pa ri me byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'das te reg par
170a4('bum): yin no// ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'das te reg pa ma yod de// ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byang ba ste
170a5('bum): gang byung ba de ri yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i dor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri rig gi 'dus te reg
170a6('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin de/ 
170a7('bum): ke'u shi ka sA'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang me byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin re// ke'u shi ka lI'i 'dus te reg pa las
170a8('bum): byang ba'i tshor ba ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin de// ko'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ 
170b1('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'das
170b2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba ma yin de// ke'u shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams pa yin re// ke'u shi ka tshwa'i khams ri ma byang ba ste/ gang pa
170b3('bum): byang ba da ni chu'i khams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka ma'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de ni me'i khams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams de ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba
170b4('bum): di ri rlung gi khams pa yin de// ke'u shi ka dam mkha'i kha mas ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri ram mkha'i kha mas pa yi de// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khar
170b5('bum): ning blang ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams pa yin re// ke'u shi ka pa rig pa ri ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni ma rig pa pa yid re// ke'u sha
170b6('bum): ka'ang byed ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka ming dang
170b7('bum): gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ming dang gzugs pa yin re// ke'u shi ka skye mched drug ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ske mched drag pa yin re// ke'u shi ka reg pa
170b8('bum): ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka tsher ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de re tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sred pa ro ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de
171a1('bum): sred pa pa yin re// ko'u shi ka len pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni len pa ma yin de// ko'u shi ka sring pa rir byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba
171a2('bum): de ni srid pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka skye ba ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rga shi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri rga shi ba yin no// ke'u shi ka sIr
171a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyir ba ri pa byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri sbrid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin re// ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ri pa byung ba ste/ gang ma blang ba de ri tshul khrim
171a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha
171a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa rir byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin re// 
171a6('bum): ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin par
171a7('bum): yin de// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin de// ke'u shi ka rang stong pa nyid rim byung ba ste/ gang pa byung
171a8('bum): bde re rang steng pa nyid pa yin no// ke'u shi ka phyi steng pa nyid rim byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi steng pa nyid pa yin re// ke'u shi ka phyi nang steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba
171b1('bum): de ni phyi nang steng pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni steng pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka chen po steng pa nyid ri pa byung ba ste/ 
171b2('bum): gang ma byang ba de ni chen pe steng pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka den dam pa steng pa nyid ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa steng pa nyid ma yin re// ko'u shi ka 'das byas
171b3('bum): steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de ni 'das byas steng pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'du pas steng pa nyid ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de na 'das ma byas stong pa nyid
171b4('bum): ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' la sa 'das pa steng pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka theg
171b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma bya nga ba de ni theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni pa byung ba ste/ 
171b6('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni dar ba med pa steng pa nyid pa yin de// ke'u shi ka rang bzhin steng ba nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang bzhin steng pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shaM ka chos
171b7('bum): thos cad snying pa nyid de ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ches thams cad steng pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
171b8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka dngos po red pa
172a1('bum): steng pathaMd rim byung ba ste/ gang byung ba don dngos pa meng bsteng bci pa yin na// ke'u shi ka shing steng pa 'din sa blang ba
172a2('bum): gang pa byung ba de ri ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid pa yin no// ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nying ri ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ri dnges po med pa'i ngo bo cing steng pa zhing pa yin de/ 
172a3('bum): ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni drar ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin de// ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ri ma byung ba ste/ 
172a4('bum): nga ma byang ba de ni yang dag par sbeng ba rnams pa yod de// ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnams pa yin ro// ke'u shi
172a5('bum): kadabang po rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni dbang po rnams pa yin de// ke'u shi ka stebs rnar sa ri pa byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ri stebs rnams
172a6('bum): ra yid na// ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams raM ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni byang chub kyi yar lag rnams pa yid de// ke'u shi ka dpags pa'i lam yang
172a7('bum): lag brgyad pa ri ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par yin de// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung
172a8('bum): ba de ri 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams pa yir ro// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de re bsam gtan rnams pa yin no// ke'u shi ka tshang med pa
172b1('bum): rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs med pa'i
172b2('bum): snyems par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i
172b3('bum): snyems par 'jug pa dgu ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
172b4('bum): med pa dang / spen pa med pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa la yin no// ke'u shi ka
172b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka ti nga nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
172b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi ske rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i
172b7('bum): stebs rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byang ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mi 'jig
172b8('bum): brnams pa yin no// ke'u shi ka se se yang dag par rig pa rnams rim byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka byems pa chen po ni
173a1('bum): ma byung ba ste/ gang pa blang ba de byabs pa chen po ma yin de// ke'u shig snang rje chen po pa byung ba ste/ gang sa byung ba de'i sring rje pe ma yin
173a2('bum): ko'u shaM ka sangs rgyas kyi ches pa 'dres pa bco brgyad ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri sangs rgyas kyi ches pa 'dres pa rnams ma yin de// ke'u shi ka rmar tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa ni mabyang
173a3('bum): ba ste/ gang la blang ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mo yin de// ke'u shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ri lan cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yir/ 
173a4('bum): ke'u shaM ka pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rim byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bya ma pa'i 'bras bu ma yin de// ke'u shi ka dgra bcom pa nyidadi ni ma blang ba ste/ gang pa byang ba der
173a5('bum): dgra ba ma pa cing ma yid de/ ke'u shi ka rang byang chub ra byung ba ste/ gangam byung ba de ni rang bang dub pa yin/ ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dem byung ba ste/ 
173a6('bum): gang ma bang ba de de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa shing ba yin de// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ri ma byang ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ 
173a7('bum): ke'u sha ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka la na cig phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba
173a8('bum): ma yin de// ke'i shi ka phyir mi 'ong ba ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka dgra bcom pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa pa
173b1('bum): yin re/ se'u shig rang sangs rgyas nim byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no// ko'u shig byang chub sems dpa' di ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma
173b2('bum): yin no// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa de ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya bin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ kyer
173b3('bum): garas brdan rab 'byor 'di de ltar bdags pa dang yang mi 'ga' ches nyid kyang ston pa ri shes rab zab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ dang
173b4('bum): ba'i re// ke'u shi ka de bzhin te/ gnas brtan rang 'a byor 'di shes rab zab me dang ldan pa ste/ de ltar ba/ gas pa dang yang mi 'gal la ches 'ad kyang ster te/ 
173b5('bum): deras lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gnas brdan rab 'byor 'ang btags pa dang yang mi 'gal
173b6('bum): la mes shing kyang sten pa lags/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// ke'u shi ka gzugs na btags pa tsa
173b7('bum): bdags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan te// ke'u shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de
173b8('bum): ches 'ding / de ri gnas brtan rab 'byer gyis mi 'gal bar bstan te// ke'u shi ka 'du shes ni btags pa tsam me// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nying de/ de gnas brda
174a1('bum): rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka 'du byed ni btags pa tsam po// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni nges nying de/ de ni gnas brdan
174a2('bum): rab 'byor gyis me 'gal bar bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni ches nyid de/ de ni garas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal
174a3('bum): bar bstan te// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal lo// gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'bar
174a4('bum): gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do// ke'u shi ka mig ni bta gas pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'ber gyis mi 'gal bar
174a5('bum): bstar / ke'u shi kar ba ni btags pa tsam mo// bdag sang tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas pa rten rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u
174a6('bum): sna'i bdags pa tsam me// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shaM ka lI ni btags paca ma// btags
174a7('bum): btsar gang yin pa deni chos nying ngo de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ko'u shi ka lus ni bdags pa tsam mo// btags btsam gang yin pa de ni ches dang
174a8('bum): de na gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ko'u shi ka yid ni btags pa tsam me// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni ches nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab
174b1('bum): 'byer gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal lo// gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba den

174b6('bum): pa de ni ches nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byer gyis mi 'gal bar bstan te// ke'u shi ka ches ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas
174b7('bum): brdar rab 'bor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan te// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhan/ ches rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal lo// gang mi 'gal rnam par
174b8('bum): 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'bor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med de// ke'u shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ra
175a1('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan te/ ke'u shi kar ba'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa car pa/ bdags pacam gang yin pa ra

175b1('bum): bstar te// ke'u shi ka snga'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam me// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstar te// ka'u shi ka
